article:
Kroc's family is very poor ,so he works in a restaurant  to make some money after school. The boss  asks _ to clean the tables every day. Kroc is very _ .
One day Kroc arrives home late. After dinner, Kroc says to his father, "I don't want to go to the restaurant tomorrow. I want to be a boss. I don't want to clean the tables every day." His father doesn't say anything. He asks Kroc to clean the table. Kroc cleans the table quickly. Then his father wipes  the table with a white cloth and the cloth becomes  very dirty. His father says to his son, Ray Kroc, "It is easy for you to clean a table, _ you can't clean it very well. _ can you be the boss?" Ray Kroc's face gets red.
He _ forgets his father's words . _ that, he uses five cloths each time to clean the tables. He _ hard all the time. The boss likes him a lot and makes him new boss of the restaurant. Ten years later, Ray Kroc opens his first restaurant company ----McDonald's.
